name: Cryo Crisis
description:
link to ludum page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/$10546305463

You, the overseer, awake on the great Arkship, on its mission to lead humankind to the stars. Something is not right however, as the colonists have been unfrozen too early, and the ship was not meant to sustain as many humans at once. 

Expand its capacity, provide for the people on the ship, make sure they stay happy and sane. 

Start up the factories that produce the what you need. Scavenge old resource stashes, and ultimately repair the engine malfunction, in order to complete your journey. 

The ship has limited space, and it will run out, unless expansion is carefully managed. Plan your moves carefully, and good luck!

-------

This is our entry for Ludum Dare 42, hope you enjoy!
